#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
char a[1000005],b[1000005];
int main()
{
   int t;
   scanf("%d",&t);
   while(t--)
   {
       cin>>a>>b;
       int n=strlen(a),i,otz=0,zto=0,z=0,o=0;
       for(i=0;i<n;i++)
       {   
           if(a[i]=='0')
            z++;
           else
            o++;
           if(a[i]=='1'&&b[i]=='0')
            otz++;
           else
            if(a[i]=='0'&&b[i]=='1')
              zto++;
       }
       if(o==0||z==0)
        cout<<"Unlucky Chef\n";
       else
       {
          cout<<"Lucky Chef\n";
          cout<<max(zto,otz)<<endl;
       }
   }
   return 0;
}
